entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
